sentences.sContent: ...the Caucasus range, an almost impenetrable barrier between Europe and Asia.
sentences.sCn: …高加索山脉，欧亚之间一道几乎不可逾越的屏障。

synos.tran: 不能通过的；顽固的；费解的；不接纳的

remMethod.val: im(不) + penetrable(可刺穿的) → 不能穿透的

words.tran: 顽固的人；不知悔改的人
不可测知；不能贯穿；不可入性

trans.tranOther: If you describe something such as a barrier or a forest as impenetrable, you mean that it is impossible or very difficult to get through
